mapper.insert: insert into Reply(rep_content, rep_type, rep_legal, rep_cus_id, rep_art_id, rep_com_id, rep_rep_id) values (#{repContent}, #{repType}, #{repLegal}, #{repCusId}, #{repArtId}, #{repComId}, #{repRepId})
mapper.select: select R.*, C.cus_avatar_url as 'customer.cusAvatarUrl', C.cus_id as 'customer.cusId', C.cus_name as 'customer.cusName' from Reply as R, Customer as C where R.rep_com_id = #{comId} and R.rep_cus_id = C.cus_id order by rep_time desc
